com.conceptwave.scripting
Class Translation

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.Translation

public class Translation
extends CWScriptable

Translation class. Represents a single translation of given translation id for a particular language. This is immutable object

          READONLY: Get the translation key.

Method Detail

_copy

public String _copy()
Make a copy the the translation object

Returns:
String the id of the translation.

equals

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean equals(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object other)
Compares two translation objects.

Parameters:
other - The other translation object
Returns:
True if both references refer to the same id and language.

getAllTranslations

public static Array getAllTranslations(String id)
Get all runtime translations for specified translation ID.

Parameters:
id - The ID of runtime translations.
Returns:
Array of runtime translations where each translation occupies two element in the array. First element is language and second is the translation text in this language, or null if no translation text found for this language.

getTranslation

public Translation getTranslation(String language)
Get the translation object in the specified language. If the translation for the language does not exists returns null.

Parameters:
language - Optional language code. If not specifies the user session language is used.
Returns:
The translation object or null

setTranslation

public static void setTranslation(String id,
                                  String text,
                                  String language)
Creates/updates the translation text in the specified language for specifies translation ID
NOTE: For data object instances use "setTranslation" instance method instead.

Parameters:
id - The translation ID
text - The new translation text in the current language
language - Language code.

setTranslation

public void setTranslation(String text,
                           String language)
